translation.auth.success: Password for Active Key has changed

translation.auth.terms: By clicking Proceed you agree that we will generate a Social Permission key and add it to your account if it has not been assigned before.

translation.auth.needPrivateActiveKey: To send this transaction, you need a Private Active Key. We generate it from your Brainkey.
translation.auth.enterPasswordPrivateActiveKey: Enter the password for your Private Active Key, stored in the browser.
translation.auth.signTransactionPrivateActiveKey: Sign the transaction with Private Active key
translation.auth.toRegister: To register this transaction, you need your Private Active Key. You can save it in your browser, encrypted with a password, in order to send your transactions faster.
translation.auth.setPasswordToSave: Set the Password to save encrypted Active Keys in your browser. This allows you to send the transactions that require Active Keys, using this password.
translation.auth.thisYourSocialPrivateKey:
This is your Social Private Key.
You will need it to authorize on a platform from any device. Keep it safe.
translation.tip.canNotEdit: Can not edit message with tip

translation.nothingHereYet: Nothing here yet. <1>Add existing community article</1> or <3>create new article.</3>

translation.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop. We support JPG, PNG or GIF files. Max file size 0,5 Mb.

translation.getReward: Get a reward for each person you invite
translation.provideReferral: Provide a referral link to your friend and gain importance from your referrals, registered on the platform. You get 10% the importance they acquire.
translation.brainkeySeed: The Brainkey is the seed phrase from which your public-private key pairs are generated. You can restore the public-private key pairs from your Brainkey if you lose the keys.
translation.brainkeyItself: The Brainkey itself cannot be restored once lost!
translation.alwaysKeepBrainkey: Always keep your Brainkey secure. Never lose it.
translation.movePointer: Move your pointer to generate the Brainkey
translation.writeDownPaper: Write it down on a paper üìù, make a photo üì∑
translation.brainkeyCannotRestored: The Brainkey cannot be restored if lost
translation.writeDownBrainkey: Write down or memorize your Brainkey. The Brainkey is your access to your account. It can‚Äôt be restored
translation.typeWordsBrainkey: Type in the words number {{num1}} and {{num2}} from your Brainkey.
translation.If you didnt save your Brainkey: If you didn‚Äôt save your Brainkey, <1><0>generate a new one<0/><1/>

translation.dontMissANewPlatform: Don‚Äôt miss a new platform release, token giveaway, or anything else we‚Äôve got in stash!
translation.fillForm: Fill the form to <1>subscribe</1> to our weekly updates.
translation.searchPeople: Search for people in U¬∞OS blockchain‚Ä¶
translation.sectionContainsSettings: This section contains settings of your blockchain account.
translation.pairSocialKeysNeeded: The pair of Social Keys is needed to sign your social transactions. After authorization on the platform, it is stored in your browser.
translation.canSetPassword: You can set a Password to save a pair of encrypted Active Keys in your browser. This allows you to send the transactions, that require Active Keys, using your Password instead. You will need to enter the Brainkey to unlock your Active Keys.
translation.provideReferralLink: Provide a referral link to your friend and gain importance from your referrals, registered on the platform. You get 10% of the importance they acquire.
translation.Get Owner and Active key pairs with Brai: Get Owner and Active key pairs with Brainkey
translation.hereYouGenerateBrainkey: Here you can generate your keys from Brainkey.
translation.needActiveKeySign: You need your Active Key to sign financial transactions
translation.canResetKeys: You can reset your Active and Social Keys using your Owner Key.

translation.Name: Name
translation.YouPubliclyPerson: You are publicly revoking your trust to this person.
translation.YourPublicTrust: Your public trust revoke is a transaction on the U¬∞OS blockchain.
translation.ThisTrustRevoke: This trust revoke transaction will be put in your profile feed and the feed of your followers.
translation.YouArePubliclyManifesting: You are publicly manifesting your¬†trust to this person.

translation.ThisTrustTransaction: This trust transaction will be put in¬†your profile feed and the feed of¬†your followers.
translation.TheProfilesYouTrust: The profiles that you trust will be¬†publicly listed in your profile.
translation.ThisTrustTransactionExpands: This trust transaction expands the¬†web of trust within the¬†network.
translation.UnstakingUOSBandwidth: Unstaking UOS from Bandwidth or CPU takes 3 days. After 3 days, you can claim your unstaked UOS.
translation.No transactions to display at the moment: No transactions to display at the moment
translation.for Network BW and CPU Time: {{action}} for Network BW and CPU Time
translation.ByCompletingTransaction: By completing this transaction, I agree to the following‚Ä¶
translation.TheIntentVoteproducer: The intent of the ‚Äòvoteproducer‚Äô action is to cast a valid vote for up to 30 BP candidates.
translation.As an authorized party: As an authorized party I {{userName}} wish to vote on behalf of {{userName}} in favor of the block produser candidates {{nodes}} with a voting weight equal to all tokens currently owned by {{userName}} and staked for CPU or bandwidth.
translation.IfIAmNotTheBenefitial: If I am not the benefitial owner of these shares I stipulate I have proof that I‚Äôve been authorized to vote these shares by their benefitial owner(s).
translation.IStipulateIHaveNot: I stipulate I have not and will not accept anything of value in exchange for these votes, on penalty of confiscation of these tokens, and other penalties.
translation.IAcknowledgeThatUsing: I acknowledge that using any system of authomatic voting, re-voting, or vote refreshing, or allowing such system to be used on my behalf or on behalf of another, is forbidden and doing so violates this contract.
translation.VoteForMaximum: Vote for a maximum of {{limit}} Block Producers.
translation.YouExtendYourTrust: You extend your trust to a Block Producer through voting.
translation.TheRankBlockProducer: The rank of each Block Producer is affected by the amount of your Importance.
translation.YourVoteExercised: Your vote is exercised each round of 126 seconds.
translation.YouCanChangeRound: You can change your vote on each round.
translation.VoteForMaximumCalculator: Vote for a maximum of {{limit}} Calculator Nodes.
translation.YouExtendYourTrustVoting: You extend your trust to a Calculator Node through voting.
translation.TheRankCalculatorNodeIs: The rank of each Calculator Node is affected by the amount of your Importance.
translation.OnceCastYourVote: Once cast, your vote is perpetually exercised. You can change your vote at any time.
translation.GovernProtocol: Govern the U¬∞OS protocol through voting. You can vote for Block Producers and Calculator Nodes. Vote with your Importance.
translation.TheBlockProducersDecentralized: The Block Producers are decentralized entities that keep the chain running by producing blocks. The Block Producers are elected through voting.
translation.CalculatorNodeIs: A Calculator Node is a node on the U¬∞OS blockchain dedicated to calculating the activity of user accounts: social, transactional, stake.

translation.toContinueAddAccountName: In order to continue, the admin of the <1>community</1> needs to transform it into a multisig account.
translation.accountPermissionsNeedUpdate: Your account permissions need to be updated in order to interact with communities' multisig accounts. Please provide your brainkey or active key to extend your social key's permissions to support community multisig accounts.
